title: Lilikoi Organic Living
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers an impressive array of vegan choices - marked with a V* - for breakfast, lunch and early dinner. Just a few of the vegan dishes include: acai bowl, banana bread, papaya, veggie sandwich, vegan burger, falafel wrap, quinoa and hummus wrap, kale caesar (and other salads), Asian style rice noodle pasta and nacho platter, as well as the featured soup of the day. Uses fresh, local and organic ingredients. Does not use  processed ingredients, unnecessary sugar and GMOs in any dish.
